Name: Military Crusaders
About the game: The game takes place in the Middle East. Build your own military base, improve the economy, extract oil, make weapons and train soldiers. The confrontation between the two sides of PMCs and the Arab rebels, the confrontation between two cultures, the confrontation between two religions... Armed with modern weapons and equipment, NATO and Soviet models. Fighting in the desert Construction of the base and fortifications Battle mode, where you can fight for the chosen side of the conflict Sandbox mode Realistic sound effects
